actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on Federal Services, Post Office.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Federal Services, Post Office, and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to extend the date that an application must be filed for former spouses to receive certain retirement benefits under chapter 83 of title 5, United States Code.
short_title: Civil Service Retirement Spousal Benefits Act of 1987

summary.text: Civil Service Retirement Spousal Benefits Act of 1987 - Amends the Civil Service Retirement Spouse Equity Act of 1984 to extend the deadline by which an application must be filed for former spouses to receive certain retirement benefits from May 8, 1987, to May 8, 1989.

titles.title: Civil Service Retirement Spousal Benefits Act of 1987
A bill to extend the date that an application must be filed for former spouses to receive certain retirement benefits under chapter 83 of title 5, United States Code.
